member.name: EMRCREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT
member.summary: The EMRCREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. The structure is followed by the bitmap bits that form a packed device-independent bitmap (DIB).

member.name: EMRCREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRCREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT.ihBrush
member.summary: Index of brush in handle table.

member.name: EMRCREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT.iUsage
member.summary: Value specifying whether the bmiColors member of the structure was provided and, if so, whether bmiColors contains explicit red, green, blue (RGB) values or indices. The iUsage member must be either the DIB_PAL_COLORS or DIB_RGB_COLORS value.
